name: Dice Dash (Norodix, BBluntBlade)
description:
Play as the 12 sided dice and collect the pawns to make the game complete again.

You can only use the ability that you just rolled marked on your dice and the top of the screen.

The spades act as checkpoints.

You can reset the environment from the pause menu.

Controllers supported.

ActionKeyMove
W A S DUse ability
SpaceReset environment
RPauseEsc

Assets and level design: BBluntblade
Music: Chris Toro
Programmer: Norodix

All assets and music used in the game were created by team members.
Sound effects are made by team members or CC0 from freesound.org
